main: ^Our mission is to provide inclusive recreational opportunities to inspire the development and well-being of the student and campus community.
things_to_do: ^Come in and enjoy taking a lap in the recreational swimming area, learn how to climb our indoor rock wall or exercise in our weight training area and cardio fitness room.

^Our recreation center offers on of the largest cardio/weight rooms on a west coast campus. This includes loads of cardio machines, strength machines, free weights and platforms with weights and Olympic barbells.
^Enjoy a game of basketball, volleyball or badminton in our multi-court gymnasium or take a class in one of our many studios.
hours_of_operation: ^Our general operating hours include Monday-Thursday AAM-Midnight, Friday 6AM-10PM, Saturday-Sunday 10AM-10PM. Saturday/Sunday 8Am-10PM. Hours may change. Please visit our website for the latest hours.
exit: ^Thanks for visiting! Be sure to walk around and look for Tuffys in the area. The nearest Tuffys are at the Titan Student Union (South) and the Kinesiology Building (East).
